TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlFileEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 为使用标准 框选择 XML 文件而提供用户界面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for selecting an XML file using a standard box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个 ，它提供了一个用于为文件名称属性选择 XML 文件的对话框。 is a that provides a dialog for selecting an XML file for a file name property. ## Examples [!code-cpp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebUITypeEditorsExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的服务提供程序和上下文编辑指定对象的值。

span.span: Edits the value of the specified object using the specified service provider and context.
The new value of the object.

returns.span: 如果未更改对象的值，则此方法应返回所传递的同一对象。

span.span: If the value of the object has not changed, this method should return the same object it was passed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供服务提供程序以获取任何所需要的编辑服务。A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.
